Subject: Heritrix 3.1.1 release now available
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=325624130; y=nAVFMMC2_0MXkGNypl4UTTZDx7NdIBSQ2air_Z7rz8b9_Q

Heritrix 3.1.1 final release is now available. See the following Release Notes page on the project wiki for full details:

https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Release+Notes+-+Heritrix+3.1.1

Binary (-dist) and source (-src) distributions are available at:

http://builds.archive.org:8080/maven2/org/archive/heritrix/heritrix/3.1.1/

As always, problem reports, ideas, fix/feature contributions, and other kinds of feedback are all welcome here on the list and on the project wiki and JIRA issue tracker:

Heritrix Wiki: http://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix
Heritrix JIRA: http://webarchive.jira.com/browse/HER

Noah
